trans-unit.source: Passed to custom WSDL exporters and importers to enable customization of the metadata export and import processes for a WSDL endpoint.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 끝점에 대한 메타데이터 내보내기 및 가져오기를 사용자 지정할 수 있도록 사용자 지정 WSDL 내보내기 및 가져오기에 전달됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext> class represents the context in which the custom WSDL for an endpoint is either exported using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> or imported using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext> 클래스는 끝점에 대한 사용자 지정 WSDL을 내보내거나(<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 사용) 가져올(<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 사용) 컨텍스트를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The following properties enable you to retrieve the WSDL document object model for the current WSDL:
trans-unit.target: 다음 속성을 사용하여 현재 WSDL에 대한 WSDL 문서 개체 모델을 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A> property gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the endpoint contract.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A> property gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the current endpoint.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlBinding%2A> property gets the binding for the current endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlBinding%2A> 속성은 현재 끝점에 대한 바인딩을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlPort%2A> property gets the port for the current endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlPort%2A> 속성은 현재 끝점에 대한 포트를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The following methods enable you to add or remove custom WSDL elements to the appropriate scopes in the exported or imported WSDL:
trans-unit.target: 다음 메서드를 사용하면 내보내거나 가져온 WSDL의 해당 범위에서 사용자 지정 WSDL 요소를 추가하거나 제거할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A> method returns the fault binding for the specified fault.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A> 메서드는 지정한 오류에 대한 오류 바인딩을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A> method returns the fault for the specified fault binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A> 메서드는 지정한 오류 바인딩에 대한 오류를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A> method returns the message binding for the specified message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A> 메서드는 지정한 메시지에 대한 메시지 바인딩을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A> method returns the message for the specified message binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A> 메서드는 지정한 메시지 바인딩에 대한 메시지를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A> method returns the operation binding for the specified operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A> 메서드는 지정한 작업에 대한 작업 바인딩을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A> method returns the operation for the specified operation binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A> 메서드는 지정한 작업 바인딩에 대한 작업을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> being exported or imported.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> being exported or imported.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A> to obtain the conversion context of the contract for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 끝점에 대한 계약의 변환 컨텍스트를 가져오려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A>를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> being exported or imported.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> being exported or imported.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A> property to obtain the service endpoint description on export or import.
trans-unit.target: 내보내기 또는 가져오기에 대한 서비스 끝점 설명을 가져오려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A> 속성을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> for the fault associated with the WSDL binding.
Gets the WSDL binding associated with the fault.
The WSDL <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding" /> associated with the fault.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A> method.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding" /> associated with the WSDL fault binding.
Gets the description for the fault associated with the WSDL fault binding.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 오류 바인딩과 연결된 오류에 대한 설명을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> for the fault associated with the WSDL binding.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A> method.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription" /> associated with the description.
Gets the WSDL binding for the message specified by the description.
trans-unit.target: 설명에서 지정한 메시지에 대한 WSDL 바인딩을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> for the message specified by the description.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A> method.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> associated with the message.
Gets the message description for the message specified by the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 바인딩에서 지정한 메시지에 대한 메시지 설명을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription" /> for the message specified by the binding.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A> method.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> of the operation associated with the binding.
Gets the WSDL binding for the operation specified by the description.
trans-unit.target: 설명에서 지정한 작업에 대한 WSDL 바인딩을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> for the operation specified by the description.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A> method.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> associated with the description.
Returns the operation description of the operation associated with the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 바인딩과 연결된 작업에 대한 작업 설명을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> of the operation associated with the binding.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A> method.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> for the WSDL endpoint.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> for the WSDL endpoint.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> for the WSDL endpoint.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> for the WSDL endpoint.
